# `ConversationEventTyping` Definition

A Typing event.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| type | `string` | Yes | Describes the type of Typing event. |
| duration | `number` | No | The duration of the Typing event in milliseconds. |
